reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Smith's lectures are clear and concise. He makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is very knowledgeable, but sometimes the pace is a bit fast.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: The lectures are informative, but the exams are tough. Attend all classes!

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is enthusiastic and makes the subject enjoyable. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: The material is interesting, but Dr. Miller's lectures are a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is great at explaining difficult concepts, but thereâ€™s a lot of memorization.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: The class is challenging, but Dr. Taylor is always available to help outside of class.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Moore is passionate about the subject and genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson encourages deep thinking and discussion, but his grading can be strict.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: The lectures are engaging, and Dr. Thomas is always willing to help students succeed.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Interesting class, but Dr. Jackson tends to go off on tangents.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. White is an excellent professor with a deep knowledge of literature.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Harris brings the art to life with his passion and storytelling.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: The material is dense, and Dr. Martin's lectures can be hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Geography
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's classes are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia is passionate about the environment and inspires her students.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is knowledgeable, but the workload is very heavy.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson's classes are practical and relevant to real-world business.

reviews.subject: Music
reviews.review: Dr. Clark's passion for music is contagious. A fantastic professor!

reviews.subject: Law
reviews.review: The material is challenging, and Dr. Rodriguez's grading is tough, but fair.
